channel.title: Help with santa
channel.description: how i get santa to say Marry christmas!

item.title: Help with santa
item.dc:creator: @iamthebest456 iamthebest456
item.description:
@iamthebest456 wrote:

look for something that one of your npcs already say then look for the next new space,

put in the Npc Id, and then below in the bottom line of that bit and put in your message…

if that dont work then tell me and i will find out why…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with santa
item.dc:creator: @mrx229 mrx229
item.description:
@mrx229 wrote:

well t works 4 me… and i looked at my other server and its prtty much the same…

except the random thing is differnt
if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552) {
if (misc.random2(22) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “HO HO HO! MERRY CHRISTMAS”;
}
}

and heres what mine says after “moo” just make sure ur doin things in the right place…or mabey urs is alot differnt

if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 0 && npcs[i].absX == 2539 && npcs[i].absY == 4719) { if (misc.random2(10) == 5) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "This portal returns you to Lumbridge!"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 0 && npcs[i].absX == 2534 && npcs[i].absY == 4716) { if (misc.random2(10) == 5) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Castle wars Portal!"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 0 && npcs[i].absX == 2440 && npcs[i].absY == 3087) { if (misc.random2(10) == 5) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Guthix portal for Castle Wars!"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552 && npcs[i].absX == 2524 && npcs[i].absY == 4777) { if (misc.random2(10) == 5) { npcs[i].animNumber = 861; npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "HO HO HO! MERRY CHRISTMAS!"; } }

Read full topic

item.title: Help with santa
item.dc:creator: @mrx229 mrx229
item.description:
@mrx229 wrote:

search for “moo” in npchandler and some where under it put this

				if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552) {
					if (misc.random2(10) == 5) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "HO HO HO! MERRY CHRISTMAS!";
					}
				}

thast what my santa says, and i also made a christmas event

Read full topic
